Articles.Content:
Details: 699 (stock)

Weight: 159

Crew: 2

This is my first attempt to create a particle system in KSP. Unfortunately, the fountain operates only with immortality.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kezPXTzcA14?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
The goo jiggles and wobbles as the craft flies. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Heh. That's pretty awesome. The things people can come up with in this game are incredible.

Cheers,

~Claw

I tried to make tiny objects which could be released with a built in decoupler, to create numerous balls for a kind of fluid system.

KSP/Unity said: N.A.N.

Which in normal language means: Frak You!
Wow this is crazy awesome. It's also crazy. And awesome.
